name: Hyperspace Collapse
description:
Hyperspace Collapse is a First-Person Shooter where a stranded astronaut must fight for survival in the void of space against a horde of alien robots.

Move from Shield Bubble to Shield Bubble to use your weapon and protect yourself. 

This game was made as part of the AIE Battle for Train Jam Game Jam, a 48 hour game jam where teams were competing to get school sponsorship to go on Train Jam.

Game requires a mouse and keyboard OR  a Xbox Controller.

Team:

Programming:

Carter Patterson

Jonathan Day

Environment and Tech Art:

Game Design:
